//Problem Author's solution

#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
	//FILE *f1=freopen("in7.txt","r",stdin);
	//FILE *f2=freopen("out7.txt","w",stdout);
	long long int t,n,k,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
		ans=n*(n-1)*(n-2)/6-k*(k-1)*(k-2)/6;
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	//fclose(f1);
	//fclose(f2);
	return 0;
}
